amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert the text of the A PLUS Act which would send funding under NCLB back to States in the form of block grants, and States would then be able to direct that funding to any education purpose under State law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 235 (Roll no. 419).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 235 (Roll no. 419).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Walker.
